net.sf.mmm.search.view.base

Class SearchViewContextBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.search.view.base.SearchViewContextBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchViewContext

    public class SearchViewContextBean
extends Object
implements SearchViewContext
    This class contains represents the context of a search-request.
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchViewContextBean

        public SearchViewContextBean(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                             SearchViewLogic logic,
                             SearchViewConfiguration viewConfiguration)
        The constructor.
        It will fill all parameters except for result-page and exception.
        ATTENTION: This constructor will automatically set itself (this) as attribute of the given request.
        Parameters:
        request - is the servlet request.
        logic - is the SearchViewLogic.
        viewConfiguration - is the SearchViewConfiguration.
